name: Under Smoke With Fire
description:
One day you awoke as someone you should've been hunting

Under Smoke With Fire is a turn based roguelite game with rpg elements such as character leveling and ability discover/upgrade systems.

                                                                                                   

This is an early prototype with not many things available. In current version there are:

  • 2 maps
  • 10 abilities
  • 2 enemy types
  • 4 objective types
